channel.title: Please Can SOMEONE come up with a code To Make This HAPPEN?
channel.description: I would like to make a [u]Fun PK Zone[/u] But I just can't find out how to make it so If you die in a certain area, you don't lose items. Can anybody please hlp me with this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2008, 09:06:37 AM[/size][hr]This is sad, no one knows.....
